newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB fixes crown +4.21 pct vs mark/usd basket.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB fixes crown +4.21 pct vs mark/usd basket.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown at 26.368 to the dollar after Monday's fixing at 26.350 and at 17.537 to the mark from 17.662.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +4.21 percent, compared with a deviation of +3.78 on Monday.
During the minute at which the central bank calculated the fixing, the crown traded at +4.20 percent.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT) and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
